com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.panels

Class SensorPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.panels.SensorPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SensorPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Creates and stores every component needed to display sensor emulation. Displays information from Sensor and provides JButtons to change or overview sensor's state.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
